description: Vikrama Simhapuri University has a well active placement cell committed to professional progress of students of Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore. All the students of the University registered with the placement cell are provided placement assistance, counselling for employment and self/social entrepreneurship, instructions and training for development of desired skills essential for suitable job profile/ higher education. faqs.question: Does the Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore offer PhD programs?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore offers PhD programs in as many as 11 disciplines. In 2010, the university first started offering PhD programs in 6 disciplines. But now it offers PhD in 11 disciplines.

faqs.question: Does the Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore offer integrated programs?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore offers integrated programs in mainly 3 disciplines. Those are, Integrated B.Sc + M.Sc, Integrated BBA + MBA and Integrated BFA.

faqs.question: Does the Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore have any placement cell?
faqs.answer: Yes of course. The Vikrama Simhapuri University, Nellore has a well active placement cell. It helps the students in professional progress through counselling, placement assistance etc.

faqs.question: How do foreign students apply to VSU?
faqs.answer: Foreign students can apply to VSU without appearing for an entrance test. However, they should satisfy the eligibility criteria and must produce an appropriate ‘STUDENT VISA’ for the study duration at VSU.

faqs.question: Does VSU provide Scholarships?
faqs.answer: VSU has designed a very economical fee structure for the student where the regular course students are given some government aid (scholarship). Only the self-financing courses do not provide government aid and the students have to pay the entire tuition fees.

Section.name: About VSU
Section.description:
Vikrama Simhapuri University (VSU) is a public state university that offers PG, Integrated M.Sc and Ph.D. courses in various specializations under its three constituent colleges. Some of the courses are MA, M.Sc, M.Com, M.Ed, M.P.Ed, MSW, Integrated M.Sc, MBA, BFA and Diploma, and lastly, Ph.D. courses.
For admission in the PG programs, students have to appear in the VSU PGCET entrance test. Final selection will be done only after the counselling process. Students are given admission in the integrated programs based on marks scored in the previous examination. For admission in the PhD program, students have to qualify in the APRCET followed by an interview. Application form can be filled online followed by submission at the university office in person or through post.
VSU has a dedicated placement cell which aims to provide students with jobs in top multinational companies. The university provides students with placement assistance through employment and entrepreneurship counseling. VSU has designed a very economical fee structure for the student where the regular course students are given some government aid (scholarship).
